Insatll Tianocore Set Eth mac addr

0) Install Centos 7.1, DDR 32GB

Get new IP, DHCP: $ sudo dhclient -r eth0 $ sudo dhclient eth0

Install IPconfig:

$ yum provides ifconfig $ yum install net-tools

Config /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts Eth0: Onboot=yes $ cd $ yum clean all $ yum update Also, get a few basic utilities $ yum install wget bzip2 ftp net-tools Set date & time 1) Download and install Centos Kernel:

$ wget ftp://amccsw:special4u@ftp.amcc.com/outbound/storm/centos/ilp32/kernel-4.0.1-300.ilp32.el7.centos.aarch64.rpm

$ wget ftp://amccsw:special4u@ftp.amcc.com/outbound/storm/centos/ilp32/kernel-core-4.0.1-300.ilp32.el7.centos.aarch64.rpm

$ wget ftp://amccsw:special4u@ftp.amcc.com/outbound/storm/centos/ilp32/kernel-devel-4.0.1-300.ilp32.el7.centos.aarch64.rpm

$ wget ftp://amccsw:special4u@ftp.amcc.com/outbound/storm/centos/ilp32/kernel-modules-4.0.1-300.ilp32.el7.centos.aarch64.rpm

$ wget ftp://amccsw:special4u@ftp.amcc.com/outbound/storm/centos/ilp32/kernel-modules-extra-4.0.1-300.ilp32.el7.centos.aarch64.rpm

/ wget ftp://amccsw:special4u@ftp.amcc.com/outbound/storm/centos/ilp32/kernel-headers-4.0.1-300.ilp32.el7.centos.aarch64.rpm ←close / wget ftp://amccsw:special4u@ftp.amcc.com/outbound/storm/centos/ilp32/0001-Centos-Support-ILP32.patch ← close

1.1) Install kernel

$ rpm -i –force –nodeps *.rpm $ reboot

2)Install APM Native Toolchain ??? Link down load toolchain 8.0.10 ???? $ wget ftp://apmfae:Ma4tha@ftp3.apm.com/outbound/shadowcat/centos/apm-8.0.10-le-20150429-nativetools.tar.bz2 $ tar xvf apm-8.0.10-le-20150429-nativetools.tar.bz2 –C /usr/local 

$ cd /lib
$ ln -s /usr/local/tools/usr/aarch64-apm-linux-gnu/libc/lib/ld-linux-aarch64_ilp32.so.1

3)Set PATH environment to use APM gcc from the previously downloaded APM toolchain 

$ PATH=/usr/local/tools/usr/bin:${PATH}
$ export PATH

4)Load Specint12: 

$ftp ftp.apm.com
$login: amccsw
$passwd: special4u

$ftp> cd /outbound/storm/SPEC 

 ftp> bin
 ftp> get specint12.tgz
 ftp> bye

5)Untar Specint12 

$ mkdir /opt/specint12-untar

cd 

$ tar vxf specint12.tgz -C /opt/specint12-untar

6)Install APM SPECint pre-compiled tools cd 

$ wget http://www.spec.org/cpu2006/src.alt/linux-apm-arm64-118.tar   
$ tar vxf linux-apm-arm64-118.tar -C specint12-untar/specint12 
$ mkdir /opt/specint12
$ cd /opt/specint12-untar/specint12
$ ./install.sh -u linux-apm-arm64 -d /opt/specint12/

reboot

7) Run SPECint ### Edit /opt/specinit12/config/linux_arm64_le_peak.cfg and add the following: APM_TOOLCHAIN_PATH=/usr/local/tools SPECINT_PATH=/opt/specint12 ####Run SPECint $ cd /opt/specint12 $ source ./shrc $ export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/apm/8.0.10-le/usr/aarch64-apmlinux-gnu/libc/libilp32:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH $ runspec –config=linux_arm64_le_peak.cfg –size=ref –rate=8 –noreportable int
